players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am innocent and need help"
Bob: "I found out that Diana is the mafioso. I will protect Alice as she seems innocent and needs help."
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I know Charlie is dead because of me. I will protect Alice as Bob suggested, but keep an eye on everyone else."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
